overview: Two teenagers, Mary (Hayley Mills) and Robert (Keith Hamshere) are lead by Professor Paganel (Maurice Chevalier) on a search expedition for the children's shipwrecked sea captain father. This Disney film was based upon Jules Verne's 1868 adventure novel Captain Grant's Children.
tagline: A Thousand Thrills, And Hayley Mills!
cast: Maurice Chevalier|Hayley Mills|George Sanders|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Michael Anderson Jr.
